Displaced Gazans have little space left to go, UN aid worker saysMany Palestinians in the Gaza Strip have followed Israeli army evacuation orders and sought safety in designated areas only to find there is little space left in the densely populated enclave, a U.N. humanitarian team leader said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 22:40:12 GMT 6QQ6HRJN7RO6XDS2BGJWHGRV7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-aid-worker-says-little-space-left-displaced-gazans-go-2023-12-25/Humeyra Pamuk世界中东地区
Eight killed in Syria in Turkish airstrikes on SDF-controlled areas -statementThe Syrian Democratic Forces said late on Monday that eight people have been killed and 18 others wounded in Turkish airstrikes against SDF-controlled areas since Dec. 23. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 22:12:35 GMT SXHNCRN37FLYLARBJZKYZPOVNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/eight-killed-syria-turkish-airstrikes-sdf-control-areas-statement-2023-12-25/Reuters世界中东地区
US welcomes Russia's Navalny being located, concerned for his well-beingThe United States welcomed reports on Monday that jailed Russian opposition politician Alexei Navalny had been located but remained "deeply concerned" about his well-being, the U.S. State Department said, calling for his immediate release. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 19:40:52 GMT UYCTXMAZTRLXLM7KQGVJO27LRU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-welcomes- Russians-navalny-being- located-concerned-his-well-being-2023-12-25/Kanishka Singh世界
At least 113 killed in attacks in central Nigeria, local official saysThe death toll in weekend attacks in the central Nigerian state of Plateau has risen to 113, a local official said on Monday, in a region where clashes between herders and farmers are common. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 18:35:38 GMT ZHXIXKDMSRNCDPXJ4W5YCD3KPM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/least-113-killed-attacks-central-nigeria-local-official-2023-12-25/Reuters世界非洲
Plane passengers held pending human trafficking inquiry leave France for IndiaA plane carrying 276 Indian passengers took off on Monday for Mumbai, the French interior ministry's local office said, after it was grounded for four days pending investigation into possible human trafficking. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 16:25:18 GMT UUKLA3RZGNNVLN7MYZRS7RXE2I https://www.reuters.com/world/plane-passengers-fate-pending- human-trafficking-inquiry-leave-france-india-2023-12-25/Reuters世界
Russian-backed union signs free trade pact with IranMembers of the Russian-led Eurasian Economic Union (EEU) have signed a fully-fledged free trade agreement with Iran, Russia's economy ministry and the EEU said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 16:19:44 GMT LKJFXPAGDZI3JNSNFM3ABVGQOY https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russian-backed-union-signs-free-trade-pact-with-iran-2023-12-25/Reuters世界
Ukraine seeks to terminate free trade deal with BelarusUkraine's government has proposed to parliament terminating a free trade agreement with Belarus, which supports Russia's invasion of Ukraine that began in February 2022, cabinet minister Taras Melnychuk said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 16:11:01 GMT 5BCTW4Z3FNKSXH4KLBON6WVHOI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-seeks-to-terminate-free-trade-deal-with-belarus-2023-12-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Two Kuwaitis kidnapped on Iraqi desert hunting trip, officials saySecurity forces are searching for two Kuwaitis who were kidnapped while on a hunting trip in a desert area in Iraq, two security officials said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 16:05:53 GMT PCJXNLKGHFN3RDB2SEPFHSZYTA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/two-kuwaiti-nationals-kidnapped-iraq-desert-security-officials-2023-12-25/Reuters世界中东地区
Russian forces gain control of Maryinka in east Ukraine, defence minister saysIt is one of Russia's most significant gains since the capture of Bakhmut in May. Most accounts of Maryinka, southwest of the Russian-held regional centre of Donetsk, describe it as a ghost town. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 15:59:48 GMT RROJQK7MMZPQPGQPLDUDQXVURI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-forces-gain-control-maryinka-east-ukraine-defense-minister-says-2023-12-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli airstrike in Syria kills senior Iranian Revolutionary Guards memberAn Israeli airstrike outside the Syrian capital Damascus on Monday killed a senior adviser in Iran's Revolutionary Guards, three security sources and Iranian state media said. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 15:49:47 GMT JPVL4NZZ3JJTNGO5HOUSE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-air-strike-syria-kills-senior-iranian-revolutionary-guards-member-2023-12-25/Reuters世界中东地区
UK's King Charles urges compassion, care for environment in time of conflictBritain's King Charles called on people on Monday to help those less fortunate during a time of economic hardship and global conflict, using his Christmas Day message to emphasise the importance of kindness, compassion and care for the environment. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 15:12:19 GMT RZVARTPYZRMLXHHNIRSKW7EJFU https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uks-king-charles-urges-compassionate-care-environment-time-conflict-2023-12-25/Reuters世界英国
